general.description_text: EuroHomeDirect® offers the {{ title }} directly from Europe. We only sell brand new and genuine products pre-packaged by the manufacturer with parts warranty.
general.description_how_title: How can we offer the {{ title }} at such a great discount in Hong Kong and Singapore?
general.description_how: We offer the {{ title }} for a greatly reduced price compared to the local prices in Hong Kong and Singapore because we are offering it directly from Europe with wholesale price.
general.description_warranty: All {{ vendor }} sold by us are compatible with Hong Kong & Singaporean standards without any modification. Our electric appliances are manufactured to operate under 220-240V with UK style power plug (type G). For all other markets with different standards, you may need to use a voltage converter and/or an adapter. All {{ vendor }} appliances sold come with 1-year parts warranty. You can read more about Compatibility and Warranty in our FAQ Page.
general.zoom: Roll over image to zoom in
general.payment_notice: Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.
general.shipping_desc_title: Buying the {{title}} in Hong Kong and Singapore
general.shipping_warning: *We have limited shipping options due to COVID-19. Surcharges may apply due to increase in prices imposed by our shipping partners. While our warehouses stay open, supplies from the manufacturers may be delayed.
general.shipping_desc: EuroHomeDirect® sells the {{title}} to Hong Kong and Singapore with free shipping for orders over HKD $15,000 / SGD $2,600 (except for oversized items). We only ship with the most reputable courier partners – DHL, Fedex, and CH Robinson. Your order will arrive safely on time when you purchase from us.

about_us.heading: About Us
about_us.text_html:
EuroHomeDirect® is an international eCommerce-company that offers consumers worldwide the exciting opportunity to purchase luxury home renovation products of all major high-end brands directly from Europe. We are a pure online retailer with flat structures and efficient organization so our prices are very competitive.
EuroHomeDirect® strives to be your one-stop home renovation outlet offering you a full range of high-end luxury appliances, sanitary, furniture and sci-fi gadgets such as smart glass or smart home systems.
about_us.text_html2: Our warehouses in Germany & UK will promptly process and ship your orders worldwide. We also provide professional installation services as an add-on to your purchase in Hong Kong & Singapore should you require. With a full range of home products for you to select and a team of friendly consultants to assist, we are sure you will find a suitable solution for your application.

why_us.heading: Why Us?
why_us.text_html:
With warehouses based in Europe, we have the most complete stock of products ready to ship worldwide. Even products that require months of wait time at your local retailers or hard to source European-specific models, you can count on us for having them available for you.
What’s more? We strive to price our products competitively to ensure you pay the same retail prices as you would in Europe! You will not pay a premium over local European consumers just because you are living on a different continent. That’s the kind of guarantee you have when you shop with us!
